description.value:
Drow gain the following spell-like abilities. The caster level for these effects is equal to the drow’s level.

  • At will @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.rSWg5JnN3mxzkatD]{Dancing Lights}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.kxx5x0JAgFuEQJAm]{Detect Magic}

In addition, drow count as having the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.ci82dXIp6UtcluEE]{Minor Psychic Power} feat for the purpose of meeting prerequisites, and if a drow takes the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.5a0a2zXORbPi09Hu]{Psychic Power} feat, she can add the drow noble’s @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.Item.SsL6aUIEvJp0sNML]{Limning Light} supernatural ability to the list of spell-like abilities available to her.
